      • getSolrFields

        public Map<String,String> getSolrFields()
        Description copied from interface: Schema
        Map of fields covered in TF-IDF extraction. The key should be qualified name, the value should be the Solr field name. For example: solrFields.put("Proxy/dc:title", "dc_title_txt");
        Specified by:
        getSolrFields in interface Schema
        Returns:
        The map of fields

        Get fields for which the values should be extracted from the records.

        getExtractableFields in interface Schema
        Returns:
